Package logic.player.ai

Class AIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.player.Player
      • logic.player.ai.AIPlayer
  • public class AIPlayer
extends Player
    Represents an AI player.
    Represents a player in the game. Stores the player's hand.

      Represents a move that can be performed in the game.

      Represents a move from a player's hand to the board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AIPlayer

        public AIPlayer​(boolean player2,
                Game game,
                java.lang.String name,
                int depth)
        Constructor for AIPlayer.
        Parameters:
        player2 - Boolean; true if player is player 2.
        game - The UI game handler the player belongs to.
        name - The name of the player.
        depth - How far down the tree to check when doing minmax.

    • Method Detail

      • doMove

        public void doMove()
        Called when it is this player's turn. In this case create a new AI processor thread and process UI input until it's done. If the game is paused, wait for it to resume before doing move.
        Specified by:
        doMove in class Player
